message.content:
You need to fix broken Amazon ASINs in the products-registry.ts file for SKINCARE and KBEAUTY category products. The current ASINs are showing "Sorry! We couldn't find that page" on Amazon.

The file is at: /Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/data/guides/products-registry.ts

Products to fix (lines ~224-308 for skincare, ~970-1066 for kbeauty):

SKINCARE:
1. cerave_cleanser - CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser (current ASIN: B01N1LL62W)
2. aquaphor_lip - Aquaphor Lip Repair (current ASIN: B006IB5T4W)
3. cerave_moisturizer - CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizer (current ASIN: B00365DABC)
4. sunscreen_elta - EltaMD UV Clear SPF 46 (current ASIN: B002MSN3QQ)
5. lrp_spf50 - La Roche-Posay Anthelios SPF 50 (current ASIN: B002CML1XE)
6. timeless_vitamin_c - Vitamin C 20% Serum (current ASIN: B0036BI56G)
7. paulas_retinol - Clinical 1% Retinol (current ASIN: B00949CO3Y)
8. ordinary_niacinamide - Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% (current ASIN: B06WGPT9LR)
9. vichy_ha - Hyaluronic Acid Serum (current ASIN: B01N7T8L4H)

K-BEAUTY:
1. cosrx_snail_mucin - COSRX Snail Mucin Essence (current ASIN: B00PBX3L7K)
2. klairs_toner - Klairs Supple Preparation Toner (current ASIN: B07BTJLLZY)
3. hada_labo_premium - Hada Labo Premium Lotion (current ASIN: B074GX619Q)
4. banila_cleansing_balm - Banila Co Clean It Zero (current ASIN: B00LNQ8SZO)
5. cosrx_aha_bha_toner - COSRX AHA/BHA Clarifying Toner (current ASIN: B00OZ9WOD8)
6. boj_glow_serum - Beauty of Joseon Glow Serum (current ASIN: B08WRWP8JY)
7. laneige_cream_skin - Laneige Cream Skin Refiner (current ASIN: B07QX44VYZ)
8. missha_bb_cream - Missha M Perfect Cover BB Cream (current ASIN: B004ALXQSO)

For each product:
1. Use WebSearch to find the correct Amazon ASIN for the exact product
2. Verify the ASIN format is 10 characters (alphanumeric starting with B0)
3. Update the products-registry.ts file with the correct ASIN

I found multiple Amazon listings for this product with different ASINs:

1→/**
     2→ * Product Registry for Guides System
     3→ * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
     4→ * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
     5→ */
     6→
     7→import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
     8→import { Product } from '@/types/results';
     9→import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';
    10→
    11→// ============================================
    12→// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
    13→// ============================================
    14→
    15→interface ProductASINs {
    16→  us?: string;
    17→  uk?: string;
    18→  de?: string;
    19→  fr?: string;
    20→  au?: string;
    21→}
    22→
    23→// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
    24→type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
    25→const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];
    26→
    27→// Helper to build region links from ASINs
    28→function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
    29→  const links: Record<string, string> = {};
    30→
    31→  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    32→    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    33→    if (asin) {
    34→      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    35→    }
    36→  });
    37→
    38→  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
    39→  if (asins.us) {
    40→    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
    41→  }
    42→
    43→  return links;
    44→}

  1237→// ============================================
  1238→// HELPER FUNCTIONS
  1239→// ============================================
  1240→
  1241→/**
  1242→ * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
  1243→ * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
  1244→ */
  1245→const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  1246→  // Supplements
  1247→  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',

  1252→};
  1253→
  1254→/**
  1255→ * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
  1256→ */
  1257→export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  1258→  // Resolve alias if it exists
  1259→  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  1260→  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
  1261→}
  1262→
  1263→/**
  1264→ * Get all products in a category
  1265→ */
  1266→export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  1267→  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
  1268→    .filter(p => p.category === category)
  1269→    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
  1270→}
  1271→
  1272→/**
  1273→ * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
  1274→ */
  1275→export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  1276→  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
  1277→    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
  1278→    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
  1279→}
  1280→
  1281→/**
  1282→ * Get products by priority level
  1283→ */
  1284→export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  1285→  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
  1286→}
  1287→
  1288→/**
  1289→ * Get all unique categories with product counts
  1290→ */
  1291→export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  1292→  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
  1293→    'hygiene',
  1294→    'grooming',
  1295→    'skincare',
  1296→    'miscellaneous',
  1297→    'supplements',
  1298→    'hair',
  1299→    'beard',
  1300→    'teeth',
  1301→    'kbeauty',
  1302→    'hormonal',
  1303→    'surgery',
  1304→  ];
  1305→
  1306→  return categories.map(category => ({
  1307→    category,
  1308→    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  1309→  }));
  1310→}
  1311→
  1312→/**
  1313→ * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
  1314→ */
  1315→export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  1316→  return ids
  1317→    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
  1318→    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
  1319→}
  1320→
  1321→/**
  1322→ * Search products by name or description
  1323→ */
  1324→export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  1325→  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  1326→  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
  1327→    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
  1328→    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
  1329→    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
  1330→    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  1331→  );
  1332→}
  1333→
  1334→/**
  1335→ * Get total product count
  1336→ */
  1337→export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  1338→  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
  1339→}
  1340→
  1341→/**

  1343→ */

  1410→// ============================================
  1411→// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
  1412→// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
  1413→// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
  1414→// ============================================
  1415→
  1416→/**

  1419→const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {

  1423→  'miscellaneous': 'tools',

  1425→  'hair': 'hair',
  1426→  'beard': 'tools',

  1428→  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  1429→  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  1430→  'surgery': 'general',
  1431→};
  1432→
  1433→/**
  1434→ * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
  1435→ * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
  1436→ */
  1437→export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  1438→  return {
  1439→    id: product.id,
  1440→    name: product.name,
  1441→    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
  1442→    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',

  1444→    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
  1445→    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
  1446→    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale

  1448→    description: product.description,

  1451→
  1452→/**

  1455→export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  1456→  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  1457→  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
  1458→}
  1459→
  1460→/**
  1461→ * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
  1462→ */
  1463→export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  1464→  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  1465→  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;

  1467→
  1468→/**

  1470→ */
  1471→export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  1472→  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
  1473→}
  1474→
  1475→/**
  1476→ * Get all products in legacy format
  1477→ */
  1478→export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  1479→  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
  1480→}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// PRODUCT DATABASE (33 Products)

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

toolUseResult.originalFile:
/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// PRODUCT DATABASE (33 Products)
// ============================================

export const GUIDE_PRODUCTS: GuideProduct[] = [
  // ============================================
  // HYGIENE (4 products)
  // ============================================
  {
    id: 'tongue_scraper',
    name: 'Stainless Steel Tongue Scraper',
    brand: 'MasterMedi',
    category: 'hygiene',
    tagline: "Your breath is out here committing war crimes and you don't even know it.",
    description: 'Medical-grade stainless steel tongue scraper. Removes bacteria and sulfur compounds that cause bad breath. Takes 10 seconds, lasts forever.',
    priority: 1,
    priceRange: { min: 7, max: 12, currency: 'USD' },
    regionLinks: buildRegionLinks({
      us: 'B01LAY47D0',
      uk: 'B01LAY47D0',
      de: 'B01LAY47D0',
      fr: 'B01LAY47D0',
      au: 'B01LAY47D0',
    }),
    isBaseStack: true,
  },
  {
    id: 'cologne_bleu',
    name: 'Bleu de Chanel EDT',
    brand: 'Chanel',
    category: 'hygiene',
    tagline: "Stop smelling like your high school gym locker. This ain't Axe bodyspray era anymore.",
    description: 'Clean, versatile, universally liked. The safe choice that works for 99% of situations. Not cheap, but compliment-to-dollar ratio is unmatched.',
    priority: 2,
    priceRange: { min: 80, max: 150, currency: 'USD' },
    regionLinks: buildRegionLinks({

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;

} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

toolUseResult.originalFile:
/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// PRODUCT DATABASE (33 Products)

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// PRODUCT DATABASE (33 Products)
// ============================================

export const GUIDE_PRODUCTS: GuideProduct[] = [
  // ============================================
  // HYGIENE (4 products)
  // ============================================
  {
    id: 'tongue_scraper',
